title: Introduction: Hoover SteamVac F5912900, F5914900, F5915900, F5918900, FH50047
transcripts: Congratulations on selecting a Hoover steam that carpet cleaner for your home. It will keep your carpets looking great and is easy to use. This video instruction guide will show you how to properly assemble operate and maintain your Hoover steam back. The model you purchased may be a different color than the one shown here but the basic components assembly operation and maintenance are the same. Your model may or may not come with a powered hand tool which is shown on this model. If your model did not come with a powered handle it will have an upholstery tool for cleaning upholstery and carpeted stairs. Be sure to read the important safety instructions in your owner's manual before operating the cleaner. There are also warnings on the back of the cleaner that you should read prior to operating this product. Click on any of the tabs marked assembly operation or maintenance for helpful video instructions. And enjoy your Hoover steam back.
